renderpass.code:
#define i iResolution
void mainImage(out vec4 j,in vec2 k){vec2 u=k/i.xy;vec2 n=(u-.5)*vec2(1,i.y/
i.x);float l=length(n),t=atan(n.x,n.y)/(26.)*20.,f=mod(pow(l+.8,-5.)*40.+iTime
*10.+t,5.)*.2;j=vec4((f+smoothstep(.2,0.,f))*texture(iChannel0,vec2(t,pow(f,-l*
.2))).rgb*smoothstep(.0,.6,l),1);}
renderpass.name: Image
